title: Jagged Edge
description: Note: Alternate/new cover edition for ASIN# B00C6DZ48CMelissa is offered a job in London and it is either unemployment or London with Mr. Edge. She thinks she has been given the biggest break of her life, what she doesn't know is why Jared hired her in the first place. Full of twists and turns and jaw dropping moments. This is what happens when your morals get thrown out the window and you finally give in.
author: LiveForeverAnon
